summary:
TROLLY - "Behind every great/successful man (Troll) there stands a woman (Trolly)."

 ABOUT - Trolly, the wife of Troll meme, is quite the character. She's known for her sharp wit, her love of a good prank, and her ability to turn any situation into a meme-worthy moment.

 HOW TO BUY - Create a Wallet

Download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.

Get Some ETH

Have ETH in your wallet to switch to $TROLLY. If you don’t have any ETH, you can buy directly on metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.

Go to Uniswap

Connect to Uniswap. Go to app.uniswap.org in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $TROLLY token address into Uniswap, select Troll, and confirm. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.

Switch ETH for Trolly

Switch ETH for $TROLLY. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.

 ROADMAP - Phase 1: Trolly launched

Phase 2: HODL $TROLLY

Phase 3: Trolly Takeover
